name: Training Bench
details: A training bench is an adjustable platform used for performing weight training exercises. You should be able to adjust the backrest.

name: Pull-Up Frame and Bar
details: This is for doing chin-ups and pull-ups. Look for a squat rack with a pull-up bar up top, and you'll save on cost and space.

name: Stationary Bicycle
details: The stationary bike is an alternative to the treadmill and rowing machine for cardiovascular endurance training.

name: Rowing Machine
details: ou can do a lot with a total-body rowing machine. .

name: Fitness Ball
details: You can design a lot of exercises around a fitness ball, especially core exercises. .

name: Treadmill
details: Invest in some type of cardio equipment. If you can afford it, you might be able to include several different types of machines.
